field.default: Currently only FTP is supported, TO-DO more external storage options ...

field.name: mm_preview_bitrate
field.label: Bit rate (kbps)
field.description: Bitrate will effect the quality of the audio preview

field.default:
Samples per peak.
   E.g. Enter 256, to use 256 input samples to create 1 waveform peak.

Note: this is for sounds up to 30 seconds.
For longer files we will increase this proportionally.
   E.g. for 60 seconds we will use 512 samples to create 1 waveform peak.

field.name: label_form
field.label: FLEXI_LABEL
field.description: Enter a label to use for item form that is different than field label for viewing

field.name: form_file_preview
field.label: File preview
field.description: You can enable file preview box, e.g. it will show image thumbnail if selected file is an image

field.name: inputmode
field.label: FLEXI_ENABLE
field.description: Select to allow editing file properties elements

field.name: use_myfiles
field.label: FLEXI_ENABLE
field.description: Enable to allow selecting an existing file that was previously uploaded
field.option: Yes (existing files + URL links + Joomla Media manager links)

field.name: jmedia_filetypes
field.label: Joomla media
field.description: Select file types what will be allowed and selectable by the editors

field.name: wf_zoom_slider
field.label: Waveform zoom slider
field.description: A slider to zoom in / out of waveform

field.name: wf_load_progress
field.label: Waveform loading progress
field.description: Display a loading messages (percent) while waveform is being downloaded

field.default: Button configuration for actions such as: download, view, share, add-to-cart

field.name: viewinside
field.label: View inside
field.description: Select to view file in same / new window

field.name: mm_show_props_list
field.default: media_format, bit_rate, bits_per_sample, sample_rate, duration, channels
field.label: Media properties

field.name: mm_show_props_list_cat
field.default: media_format, bit_rate, bits_per_sample, sample_rate, duration, channels
field.label: Media properties

field.default: Media properties Filters. Currently these effect all Media properties in the same way
